message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm willing to offer you a 20% discount if you buy now. This is a one-time offer, and the price will go back to $10000 after this round. Please let me know if you're interested.
I'm not interested in buying the product at the current price, I'd like to wait for the next round.

This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer such a good deal again. Please consider this as a rare opportunity to get a low-quality product at a discounted price.
